mapper.select: SELECT A.P_ID, A.P_NAME, A.P_SIZE, A.P_GENDER, A.P_PRICE, A.PRODUCTABLE_STATUS FROM BID_PRODUCT A ORDER BY A.P_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID_PRODUCT A ( A.P_ID, A.P_NAME, A.P_SIZE, A.P_GENDER, A.P_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{pId}, #{pName}, #{pSize}, #{pGender}, #{pPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BID_PRODUCT A SET A.P_NAME = #{pName}, A.P_SIZE = #{pSize}, A.P_GENDER = #{pGender}, A.P_PRICE = #{pPrice} WHERE P_ID = #{pId}
